body_html: From my understand the TensorFlow memory allocation is tied to the process state, given that as a fix I spawn sub process and ran the model generation as part of it. Once the subprocess is done, memory is clear out.
body_text: From my understand the TensorFlow memory allocation is tied to the process state, given that as a fix I spawn sub process and ran the model generation as part of it. Once the subprocess is done, memory is clear out.
body: From my understand the TensorFlow memory allocation is tied to the process state, given that as a fix I spawn sub process and ran the model generation as part of it. Once the subprocess is done, memory is clear out.
